title: The Road accident at Dhaula Kuan Metro Pillar no. 37-38 verge involving overturning of Santro Car DL 8C N 8634Travelandtourworld.com
text:
The Road accident at Dhaula Kuan Metro Pillar no. 37-38 verge involving overturning of Santro Car DL 8C N 8634 Published on : Tuesday, September 8, 2015
Based upon the part news covered in various print and electronic media, the spokesperson in AAI is getting lot of queries regarding the details about the AAI officer involved in the accident.
To put things in the right perspective, the unfortunate accident that had killed the two youths involved Mr. Joydeep Singh not Jaideep Singh, who is the son of a Senior Officer working in AAI.
He was not on the Driverâ€™s Seat. He was a young & bright Child almost having gone through the placement formalities, not looking for a job as reported.
He had a bright career ahead in the field of Electronics. AAI family at this gesture expresses its deep condolence to the grieving family and pray to God to give them strength to bear this unbearable loss.
